<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475" lineLink="#a728a93afb3dc13272034c0f59100f0ea"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a> <a href="#a728a93afb3dc13272034c0f59100f0ea">getELFKindForNamedSection</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a> K) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// N.B.: The defaults used in here are not the same ones used in MC.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We follow gcc, MC follows gas. For example, given &quot;.section .eh&#95;frame&quot;,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// both gas and MC will produce a section with no flags. Given</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// section(&quot;.eh&#95;frame&quot;) gcc will produce:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703" lineLink="#a5ff5b7a3a331a125bf3c5c70c9b3e686"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a5ff5b7a3a331a125bf3c5c70c9b3e686">calcUniqueIDUpdateFlagsAndSize</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sectionname">SectionName</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Increment uniqueID if we are forced to emit a unique section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This works perfectly fine with section attribute or pragma section as the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sections with the same name are grouped together by the assembler.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ForceUnique)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NextUniqueID++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A section can have at most one associated section. Put each global with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MD&#95;associated in a unique section.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Associated = GO-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#aef569d822dbf572ae71954d6831ce8a9">getMetadata</a>(LLVMContext::MD&#95;associated);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Associated) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">    Flags |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#a5def04786ab543821414e3d5f609e015a9284ee71917fdddaa2eeaba1bfe17e2b">ELF::SHF&#95;LINK&#95;ORDER</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ctx.getAsmInfo()-&gt;useIntegratedAssembler() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If two symbols with differing sizes end up in the same mergeable section</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that section can be assigned an incorrect entry size. To avoid this we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// usually put symbols of the same size into distinct mergeable sections with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the same name. Doing so relies on the &quot;,unique ,&quot; assembly feature. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// feature is not available until binutils version 2.35</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (https://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show&#95;bug.cgi?id=25380).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfilemacho/#a66ebd2ccd2ea699bd04b40dd95c2fee4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfilemacho/#a66ebd2ccd2ea699bd04b40dd95c2fee4">TargetLoweringObjectFileMachO::getIndirectSymViaGOTPCRel</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> &#42;GV, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;Sym, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> &amp;MV,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> &#42;MMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer">MCStreamer</a> &amp;Streamer)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Although MachO 32-bit targets do not explicitly have a GOTPCREL relocation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as 64-bit do, we replace the GOT equivalent by accessing the final symbol</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// through a non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr stub instead. One advantage is that it allows the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// computation of deltas to final external symbols. Example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    &#95;extgotequiv:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       .long   &#95;extfoo</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    &#95;delta:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       .long   &#95;extgotequiv-&#95;delta</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is transformed to:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    &#95;delta:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       .long   L&#95;extfoo$non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr-(&#95;delta+0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       .section        &#95;&#95;IMPORT,&#95;&#95;pointers,non&#95;lazy&#95;symbol&#95;pointers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    L&#95;extfoo$non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       .indirect&#95;symbol        &#95;extfoo</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       .long   0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The indirect symbol table (and sections of non&#95;lazy&#95;symbol&#95;pointers type)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may point to both local (same translation unit) and global (other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// translation units) symbols. Example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// .section &#95;&#95;DATA,&#95;&#95;pointers,non&#95;lazy&#95;symbol&#95;pointers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// L1:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    .indirect&#95;symbol &#95;myGlobal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    .long 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// L2:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    .indirect&#95;symbol &#95;myLocal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    .long &#95;myLocal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the symbol is local, instead of the symbol&#39;s index, the assembler</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// places the constant INDIRECT&#95;SYMBOL&#95;LOCAL into the indirect symbol table.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then the linker will notice the constant in the table and will look at the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// content of the symbol.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Priority == 65535)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, we need to compute a new section name. Low priorities should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// run earlier. The linker will sort sections ASCII-betically, and we need a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// string that sorts between .CRT$XCA and .CRT$XCU. In the general case, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// make a name like &quot;.CRT$XCT12345&quot;, since that runs before .CRT$XCU. Really</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// low priorities need to sort before &#39;L&#39;, since the CRT uses that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// internally, so we use &quot;.CRT$XCA00001&quot; for them. We have a contract with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the frontend that &quot;init&#95;seg(compiler)&quot; corresponds to priority 200 and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;init&#95;seg(lib)&quot; corresponds to priority 400, and those respectively use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#39;C&#39; and &#39;L&#39; without the priority suffix. Priorities between 200 and 400</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use &#39;C&#39; with the priority as a suffix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;24&gt;</a> Name;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastLetter = </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;T&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddPrioritySuffix = Priority != 200 &amp;&amp; Priority != 400;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Priority &lt; 200)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastLetter = </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;A&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Priority &lt; 400)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastLetter = </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;C&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Priority == 400)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><Highlight kind="normal">      LastLetter = </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;L&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-svector-ostream">raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream</a> OS(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.CRT$X&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; (IsCtor ? </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;C&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;T&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &lt;&lt; LastLetter;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AddPrioritySuffix)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><Highlight kind="normal">      OS &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;%05u&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, Priority);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectioncoff">MCSectionCOFF</a> &#42;Sec = Ctx.getCOFFSection(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><Highlight kind="normal">        Name, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#a45c610228e069b0b3efbcbc1d5577f5aa6a1c5fd37f3374c2e8e233d9e19bd205">COFF::IMAGE&#95;SCN&#95;CNT&#95;INITIALIZED&#95;DATA</a> | <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#a45c610228e069b0b3efbcbc1d5577f5aa3c5ce7207c84ca0e6a03fd08ab4831ba">COFF::IMAGE&#95;SCN&#95;MEM&#95;READ</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We always use a qualname symbol for a GV that represents</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a declaration, a function descriptor, or a common symbol.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2351"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a GV represents a GlobalVariable and -fdata-sections is enabled, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// also return a qualname so that a label symbol could be avoided.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is inherently ambiguous when the GO represents the address of a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function, as the GO could either represent a function descriptor or a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
